entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 a.m. PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 6:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 30 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 41 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level near valley bottom. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
